QuestData.Title: Stomping Grounds
QuestData.Description: Greetings little one. I know not what madness has brought you to the Crystal Vice, but you are welcome in my presence. $b$bThese ice worms... these jormungar have taken a taste to eating my brothers. I doubt you will find my kind friendly by any terms during this time of battle, but if you are here to help with the worms, then you have my ear.$b$bIf we are to take the cavern back, we must first clear the canyon of these jormungar feeders. Join us in battle, $r!
QuestData.LogDescription: Delve into the cavern at the north end of the Crystal Vice and kill 8 Ice Heart Jormungar Feeders for Ko'char the Unbreakable.
QuestData.CompletionText: The battle persists, come with good news or leave me, little one.
